Title: software engineer
email_subject: Connecting with a Fellow RIT Alum
email_body:
Hi Piper,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [name], and I'm a [year] student at Rochester Institute of Technology, majoring in [major]. I came across your profile and noticed that you are a software engineer at Spotify. As someone interested in pursuing a career in [career_interests], I would love to learn from your experiences in the tech industry.

As a fellow RIT alum, I believe we share a common background that could lead to an insightful conversation. If you have 15-20 minutes in the next couple of weeks, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to chat and gain your perspective on breaking into the field.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of connecting!

Best regards,

[name]
